layout.title: Pricing Table Circle Layout
layout.message: Displays a list of subscription plans in Pricing Table Layout with price in a circle.

field.name: id
field.label: Select Category
field.description: Select category which you want to display subscription plans

field.name: recommended_campaign_id
field.label: Recommended Plan ID
field.description: ID of the subscription plan which will be marked as recommended

field.name: standard_plan_color
field.label: Standard Plan Background Color
field.description: Choose background color of the standard plans

field.name: recommended_plan_color
field.label: Recommended Plan Color
field.description: Choose background color of the recommended plan

field.name: plan_ids
field.label: Plans
field.description: Select the plans which you want to be displayed. If you don't select any plans here, all plans will be displayed

field.name: exclude_plan_ids
field.label: Exclude Plan Ids
field.description: Enter IDs of the plans which you don't want to be displayed on this page, comma separated

field.name: intro_text
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: If you enter some text here, it will be displayed at the top of plans list.
